name: YOUR ORC BOYFRIEND
description:
A twine game, made over the course of a week.

It's about visiting your boyfriend.

It has four endings.

CONTENT WARNING: Discussion of abuse

MENTIONED BRIEFLY IN THE GAME, AND VERY RECOMMENDED: 

Rxcovery by L.O.V.E games https://lovegames.itch.io/rxcovery (Play this it's good)

Please enjoy your holiday season. Unless you're reading this at some other point in time. In which case, just have a nice time.
